title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“This has revealed an Achilles heel at the heart of the North American power system.” [Heard during a news broadcast on the U.K.'s Classic FM radio station reporting on the power failures in the U.S. and Canada. Submitted by Tony Hall, Aylesbury.“ I suppose if you have a heel in your heart you have to expect the odd mishap?”
